nodes.text: A Bith starship dealer was present on the planet of Nal Hutta around 21 BBY and sold two ships to Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, who was disguised as bounty hunter Rako Hardeen. The first was shot down by the Hutts and the second only had enough fuel to make it to his brother's refueling station on Orondia.
In the French version of the episode, his name is Vector.[source?]
